comments: Number of lattice paths from (0,0) to (n,n) with steps E=(1,0) and N=(0,1) which touch or cross the line x-y=4. - _Herbert Kociemba_, May 23 2004
links: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards, Applied Math. Series 55, Tenth Printing, 1972 [alternative scanned copy], p 828
M. Janjic and B. Petkovic, A Counting Function, arXiv preprint arXiv:1301.4550, 2013. - From N. J. A. Sloane, Feb 13 2013
prog: (MAGMA) [ Binomial(2*n,n-4): n in [4..150] ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 13 2011(PARI) first(m)=vector(m,i,binomial(2*(i+3),i-1)) \\ _Anders Hellstr√∂m_, Aug 17 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
